import React from 'react'; import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import SVG from "react-inlinesvg"; import { toAbsoluteUrl } from "../../../../../../_metronic/_helpers"; import { CardBody } from '../../../../../../_metronic/_partials/controls'; import { format, parseISO } from 'date-fns'; export function VerifiedInprogresView( props) { const paymentVerification = props.paymentVerification; const paymentInfo = props.paymentInfo; const salesOfficerLocation = props.salesOfficerLocation; const paymentAdjustmentInfo = props.paymentAdjustmentInfo; const paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo = props.paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo; console.log("SSSSS", props.paymentAdjustmentInfo); console.log("FFFFFFFF", props.paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo); return ( <>
if(paymentAdjustmentInfo !== undefined) {
paymentAdjustmentInfo.mappingDate!==null ? {format(parseISO(paymentAdjustmentInfo.mappingDate), 'HH:mm a')} : ""
{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.mappingDate), 'dd MMM yyyy')}
{paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo.name}
{paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo.designation}
Payment Adjustment

{/* {paymentAdjustmentInfo.} */}

}
{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.actionTakenDate), 'HH:mm a')}
{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.actionTakenDate), 'dd MMM yyyy')}
{paymentInfo.actionTakenBy.name}
{paymentInfo.collectionBy.designation.name}
Payment Verification {paymentVerification == "APPROVED" ? "Verified" : ""}

{paymentInfo.rejectReason}

{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.paymentDate), 'HH:mm a')}
{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.paymentDate), 'dd MMM yyyy')}
{paymentInfo.collectionBy.name}
{paymentInfo.collectionBy.designation.name}, {salesOfficerLocation.location_type} ({salesOfficerLocation.location_name})
Payment Collection

{paymentInfo.remarks}

); }
